title: For r3ave or meddler
body: Is azir planned for a bigger gameplay update down the line (I think you guys said xin would get one later) or is he just gonna stay with the changes on pbe

replies.body: No plans for a larger Azir update, no. I'm sure they'll be some follow up tuning needed on these changes though of course.
Ahh ok. Ty for replying, azirs changes look great

Anything coming for Viktor?

Looks like he's not doing too well with the weaker Rylai's, any tweaks heading his way to add some power?
Tbh I played some Viktor lately, and I found it really strong. Try hextech gunblade, it sounds weird but trust me, it works.

Sometimes people can do good and sometimes people don't, so I try to use that stat aggregation websites to remove any perception bias, and he's at about 46 and change percent winrate, which is not good.

any changes for twitch coming up? hes been incredibly strong for months now and no one mentions it.
so what about 4v5 in promos how is that fair, and how can someone get demoted for unfair games?
